attributes.action: increase maternity leave to a period of five years to allow mothers to be mothers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Unicef placed the UK worst amongst industrialised nations for child well-being.  Numerous studies have demonstrated that full-time mothers are always the best for the child and the family, and yet maternity leave only lasts a few weeks.

At the moment, unless a mother happens to be single or have a husband with a substantial income, she must return to work after the end of her maternity period.

For this reason, we call upon the government must provide appropriate financial support for mothers who wish to do so to look after their children properly until they reach school age.
